spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout resembles the plan (Activity at left, Balcony bottom-left, bedrooms to the right), but several spatial mismatches are evident: Bath/WC zone appears simplified/merged and does not clearly match the two-room arrangement; central hall geometry and door openings do not align cleanly with the plan; exterior window locations are generalized into continuous ribbon windows rather than matching the plan’s specific window spans; room proportions appear distorted (Activity zone and corridor sizing vs bedrooms).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are mostly preserved (hall to bedrooms; balcony off Activity), but key plan-defined elements are not faithfully constructed: WC as a distinct room is not clearly present; linen storage is not clearly represented as a dedicated closet in the same location; several door embeddings and swings do not correspond to the plan; some built-ins (robes) are simplified and their exact placement differs. No clear extra full room is added, but several partitions/built-ins appear hallucinated or relocated.

furniture_mapping.notes: Beds are placed in the expected rooms, but furniture is largely generic and not mapped to the 2D symbols accurately (Activity room furniture arrangement differs; balcony furniture differs). Several items appear scaled inconsistently relative to room sizes (seating/table vs circulation).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric presentation with coherent lighting and readable geometry. However, the camera appears slightly perspective rather than true orthographic/isometric; window modeling is repetitive and reduces plan-specific clarity; some door/wall intersections read ambiguous due to simplified detailing.

detected_errors.description: Separate WC room from the plan is not clearly represented as an independent enclosed space with its own correct doorway.
Bath/WC partitioning and placement do not match the plan’s two distinct rooms (Bath and WC) and their corridor-facing openings.
Linen closet is not clearly placed/formed as shown on the plan (location and enclosure differ/unclear).
Bedroom door placements (notably to Bed 3/Bed 4) appear shifted relative to the plan’s hinge-side locations and corridor geometry.
Multiple door swing orientations do not correspond to the 2D plan (swing direction/hinge side inconsistent).
Window placement is generalized into continuous ribbon windows and does not match the plan’s specific window spans per room (Activity/Bed 2/Bed 3/Bed 4).
Room proportion distortion: Activity/corridor scale relationship vs bedrooms differs from the plan, altering perceived room sizes and circulation width.
Hallway/built-in details near the stair/recess area include simplified or extra partitioning not evidenced in the 2D plan.
